uk.ac.ebi.reactionblast.graphics.direct

Class DirectReactionDrawer

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.ebi.reactionblast.graphics.direct.AbstractDirectDrawer
      • uk.ac.ebi.reactionblast.graphics.direct.DirectReactionDrawer

  • public class DirectReactionDrawer
extends AbstractDirectDrawer
    Directly draw, modifying the points in the atom containers.
    Author:
    maclean
